body:
Dear Spionase

I want to say sorry to you.

I know maybe you will insult me more. But I am glad to see that you like kuroinu juu. So I want share something with you.

I don‘t care whether you insult me，I care whether you can feel so good from kuroinu juu‘s books.

@Spionase
Dear  Spionase
I am the stupid Chinese. And I make you feel angry. I am very very sorry.
If you like kuroinu juu，Let me tell you the way to get all his books

magnet:?xt=urn:btih:A3BQIXIDAPBBFXNXWJP3VUJMHKEMBLQV

This is kuroinu juu library v2.
And I register the account of https://nhentai.net because I want to say sorry you.
Stupid chinese upload the same again..
